definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 S. [[נַעֲוֵיתִי]] Is 21:3, Ps 38:7; Pt. cstr. [[נַעֲוֵה]] Pr 12:8; f. cstr. [[נַעֲוַת]] 1Sa 20:30 (but rd. [[נַעֲרַת]] LXX We Dr SS Bu HPS);—be bent, bowed down, twisted, ‖[[שׁחה]] Ps 38:7; ‖[[נבהל]] Is 21:3; [[נַעֲוֵה לֵב]] Pr 12:8 one perverted of mind.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[עִוׇּה]], subj. ´[[י]]:—La 3:9 my paths hath he twisted; ´[[וְע]] Is 24:1 its surface will he distort (‖[[בּוֹקֵק הָאָרֶץ]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 S. [[יׇשָׁר הֶעֱוֵיתִי]] Job 33:27 the right have I perverted (‖[[חָטָא]]); so 3 pl. [[הֶעֱווּ אֶת־דַּרְכָּם]] Je 3:21.
